html:
Clouds in the sky
The wind blows
The letters
Had been sent
Cigarette smoke
Flies away fast
Like itâ€™s in a hurry
To get out from here
Mr Ladybug
Did his mating dance
Before me
Wanted to be on camera
The leafs are falling
Autumn is coming
The cemeteries
Will be shining again
title: Clouds and cemeteries
